Klasse Planner

java.lang.Object
Planner
public class Planner extends Object
the Planner is the root component of this project and performs most of the logic

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Planner

      public Planner(ArrayList<Action> actions, State start, State end) throws IllegalArgumentException
      create a new planner from given actions, start and end State
      Parameter:
      actions - list of the available actions to insert into the plan
      start - State of the planner
      end - State of the planner
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if (actions == null) or (actions.contains(null)) or (start == null) or (end == null)

    • Planner

      public Planner(Planner planner) throws IllegalArgumentException
      creates a new Planner that is a copy of the given Planner
      Parameter:
      planner - to copy
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if (planner == null)
